Welcome to the October 2021 Edition 
of the Justia Insights Client Newsletter!

Check out the latest in this month’s edition of Justia Insights! Find out whether there is any truth behind six of the most common SEO myths, learn more about setting up your own Google Ads campaigns, and find out what some of our clients have to say about their own legal marketing journeys. Catch up on marketing and technology news, and see what our team at Justia has been up to recently.

Featured News

Lawyers Beware: 6 Common SEO Myths, Some of Which May Be Partially True

Search engine optimization (SEO) is a frequently discussed topic in digital marketing and technology circles, but myths and conspiracy theories are widespread. Check out this post to learn more about the common SEO myths lawyers should think twice about.

From the Desk of Justia

Official Lawyer Directories of State Bar Associations & Licensing Organizations

While many organizations maintain lawyer directories, each attorney licensing organization also offers an official directory that serves as a roster of attorneys eligible to practice in that jurisdiction. Check out this post for a list of directories maintained by these agencies, and to learn more about whether these profiles help you with legal marketing.

Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers: Second Quarter 2021

We’ve reviewed the Justia Ask A Lawyer data from the second quarter of 2021, and the numbers are in! Check out this post to learn more about common searches, see the most active lawyers on the forum, and spot the changes in the data.

The Law of a Law Firm Website

There are many moving parts to creating a law firm website, including potential legal implications for a lawyer’s website content, design, behavior, and more. Check out this post for information on five legal concerns you need to keep in mind when creating your law firm site.

Lawyers and Law Firms on TV: 20 Iconic Legal TV Shows

After a long day at the office, there is nothing like relaxing with a TV show that helps you forget the stressful day. For many, television is the perfect company for fun and entertainment, even when the programs may relate to your chosen profession.

Legal Marketing Tips for New Lawyers From Seasoned Attorneys

Are you a new lawyer considering hanging your own shingle? Have you just started your own law firm? We have some marketing tips for you – straight from lawyers who have already traveled this path.

How To Set Up a Google Search Ad

Interested in using pay-per-click (PPC) ads to create a more well-rounded marketing strategy for your law firm, but don’t know how? Let this quick start guide help you navigate the initial set up process.

Webmaster’s Corner

The Basics of Crawling, Indexing, and Ranking

In today’s day and age, people commonly turn to the internet, seeking answers to their questions through various search engines. Understanding the process by which these search engines crawl, index, and rank content is both interesting and essential to improving your website’s search performance.

Inside Justia

Meet Our Team

"Pixcel" Challenge

Our team participated in a "pixcel" challenge this month, creating awesome images pixel by pixel in Excel. We were delighted by all the submissions full of quality, creativity, and talent. We took a team vote, and Carolina won a prize for her submission of the Japanese bathhouse from the animated film Spirited Away.

A Pug’s Tale

Friends of the Hug Pugs

The pugs are proud to introduce another pal of theirs: Mez's dog, Ares, a mix between Great Dane and Saint Bernard. Despite being super lazy, Ares enjoys long walks around the neighborhood so that he can smell every bush along the way. While he is 6 years old, he still has the heart of a puppy!
